elements.text: You are co-hosting a dinner party at your friend's apartment, and you just finished all the shopping. You start to sweat and feel your heart pounding after a couple of trips carrying the groceries up to the third floor. You feel a bit scared of these sensations. Unsure of whether they are good or bad, you decide to simply accept...

elements.name: Dinner Party Supplies_Physical Health_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
